dialog: Haven't you had any sleep Mr?
What were you thinking Peregrin Took?
Little Hobbits do not belong in war Master Meriadoc.
I think you have strength of a different kind
You Look Terrible.
Throw Yourself In Next Time And Rid Us Of Your Stupidity!
Hey, Stinker! Don't Go Getting Too Far Ahead.
Your love of the halfling's leaf has clearly slowed your mind.
You don't have any friends. Nobody likes you
Be silent! Keep your forked tongue behind your teeth. I have not passed through fire and death to bandy crooked words with a witless worm!
Fool of a Took! Throw yourself in next time, and rid us of your stupidity.
Get thee gone from my gate, thou jail-crow of Mandos
Only a Nazgûl deals in absolutes
What is your family but a thatched barn where brigands drink in the reek, and their brats roll on their floor among the dogs!
Stupid fat hobbit ruins it!
He breathed so loud we could have shot him in the dark
So there's no hard feelings. Forgive and forget.
My precious!
Po-Tay-Toes!
Cut him down!
They cursed us!
Get down cur!
Get back in the line you maggots! Get back in the line you slugs!
Shut up you! Go away! Get out of here!
Aaaaaahhhh!
I'm sorry, Treebeard.
